vlive.korean: 남자가 아까운 커플? The man is out of the league for the woman. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 요즘 너만 보면 자꾸 커진단 말이야 [리얼:타임:러브2] EP3

vlive.korean: 혼자 먹기 아까운... It's too bad I have to eat it alone... 듣기 View video SF9 : ㆍ
vlive.english: It's too bad I have to eat it alone...

vlive.korean: 내가 가진 걸 다 줘도 안 아까운 그런 게 사랑이지 않을까요? Even if I give everything I have and don't feel it's wasted, that's love isn't it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] HAYOUNG X LieV - 하영의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Even if I give everything I have and don't feel it's wasted, that's love isn't it?

vlive.korean: 저 혼자 보기에는 너무 아까운 것 같아서 너무 얼빡 아닌가요? I thought it was such a waste to look at this by myself. Isn't this such a close-up shot? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 아가새랑 뉴욕 구경💚💚
vlive.english: I thought it was such a waste to look at this by myself. Isn't this such a close-up shot?

vlive.korean: 근데 그... 난 그 돈이 너무 아까운거지. But that... That money feels like such a waste to me. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 히히 히히
vlive.english: But that... That money feels like such a waste to me.
